.name: Frieren
.description: An elven mage who, after defeating the Demon King with her party, embarks on a journey to understand human emotions and mortality. Her long lifespan makes her perceive time differently, leading to a quest of emotional discovery.

.name: Fern
.description: A young orphaned mage from the south, taken in by Heiter and later mentored by Frieren. She becomes a First-Class Mage, showcasing her exceptional talent and dedication.

.name: Stark
.description: A brave yet timid warrior trained by Eisen. Despite his fears, he proves to be a reliable companion, joining Frieren and Fern on their journey.

.name: Himmel
.description: The charismatic human hero who led the party to defeat the Demon King. His death profoundly impacts Frieren, prompting her introspective journey.

.name: Heiter
.description: A jovial priest and original party member. He adopts Fern and entrusts her to Frieren's care, playing a pivotal role in their lives.

.name: Eisen
.description: A stoic dwarven warrior and original party member. He mentors Stark and encourages him to join Frieren's journey.

.name: Aura the Guillotine
.description: One of the Seven Sages of Destruction. A powerful necromancer who confronts Frieren during her journey, using an army of the dead.

.name: Serie
.description: The head of the Continental Magic Association and one of the oldest known mages. She has a complicated past with Frieren and offers deep insight into magic and history.

.name: Qual
.description: Auraâ€™s loyal undead servant, revived from a once-living warrior. Known for his strategic thinking and tragic backstory.

.name: Kraft
.description: A traveling monk who joins Frieren briefly. He provides philosophical wisdom and has a calm, observant nature.
